stripped_text: Shadow can be advanced and has +1 strength for each advancement token on it. Subroutine The Corp gains 2 credits. Subroutine Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
text:
Shadow can be advanced and has +1 strength for each advancement token on it.
[subroutine] The Corp gains 2[credit].
[subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
title: Shadow
